longBusinessSummary: CLPS Incorporation provides information technology (IT), consulting, and solutions to institutions operating in banking, insurance, and financial sectors in the People's Republic of China and internationally. The company offers IT consulting services in credit card business areas, such as credit card application, account setup, authorization and activation, settlement, collection, promotion, point system, anti-fraud, statement, reporting, and risk management. It also provides banking services, including business analysis, system design, development, testing, system maintenance, and operation support; and services in loans, deposit, general ledger, wealth management, debit card, anti-money-laundering, statement and reporting, and risk management, as well as architecture consulting services for banking systems, and online and mobile banking. In addition, the company offers solutions in the field of wealth management; e-commerce solutions in online platforms, cross-border e-commerce, live streaming, and social media; and automotive solutions comprising of big data governance, data analysis, intelligent cockpits, in-car experience interaction, and in-car marketplaces solutions. Further, it provides IT services to its clients in the banking, wealth management, e-commerce, and automotive industries. Additionally, the company operates CLPS Virtual Banking platform, a training platform for IT talents; recruitment and headhunting; and fee-for-service training services, as well as sells product and third-party software. CLPS Incorporation was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Kwun Tong, Hong Kong.

companyOfficers.name: Mr. Srustijeet  Mishra
companyOfficers.title: Chief Executive Officer - CLPS SEA & USA
